data.title: Oppn walks out of RS over 'Jaya Amitabh Bachchan'
data.meta_description: On her exchange of words with Rajya Sabha Chairman Jagdeep Dhankhar, Samajwadi Party MP Jaya Bachchan says, I objected to the tone used by the Chair. We are not school children. Some of us are senior citizens. I was upset with the tone and especially
data.text:
Kiran Choudhry quits as MLA, BJP likely to give her RS ticket

Haryana MLA Kiran Choudhry has resigned from the Vidhan Sabha and is likely to be fielded in the Rajya Sabha bypolls by the Bharatiya Janata Party, nearly two months after she joined the party after quitting the Congress.

Depression Nearly Broke Me: Robin Uthappa

'I remember in 2011 I went the year so ashamed of who I became as a human being that I couldn't look at myself in the mirror.' 'I went all of 2011 just not looking at myself in the mirror.'

Himachal mayor disqualified because of 'male bias': SC

The Supreme Court on Monday kept in abeyance the fresh election for the post of the mayor of Solan in Himachal Pradesh as it termed the disqualification of the incumbent, Usha Sharma, "a case of male bias".
